# margins

**Instance Property**

The amount of empty space (in points) around the grid’s content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var margins: NSEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `NSEdgeInsetsZero`. Changing this property to a new value invalidates the layout.

## Specifying the Grid Layout Attributes

- **minimumInteritemSpacing**: The minimum spacing (in points) to use between items in the same row or column.
- **minimumLineSpacing**: The minimum spacing (in points) to use between rows or columns.
